long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on an interstellar journey with Honkai Star Rail in this immersive live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and cosmic interface inspired by the futuristic landscapes and characters of Honkai Star Rail.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements the galactic aesthetics of Honkai Star Rail.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Honkai-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as dynamic and expansive as the Honkai Star Rail universe.
